heading_7: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Turkey e-Sim
content_1_heading_7: Is Turkey data sim connectivity faster than physical sim?
content_2_heading_7: E-sim’s connectivity depends upon the network coverage the e-sim data plan supports. Hence, the e-sim and physical sim’s network remains the same.
content_3_heading_7: How do I convert the e-sim in Turkey back to physical sim card?
content_4_heading_7: You can convert the e-sim connectivity to physical sim card by deactivating the e-sim card via phone’s setting and inserting the physical sim card.
content_5_heading_7: Can I have Turkey e-sim with phone number?
content_6_heading_7: E-sim functions exactly like physical sim card. Hence, you get the facility of having a local number in an e-sim plan. Whereas you can also have data only e-sim plan, if you don’t wish to have phone number.
content_7_heading_7: Can E-sim and physical sim have same phone numbers?
content_8_heading_7: No, e-sim and physical sim cannot have same phone numbers as their data plans have to be managed separately.
